titles: To [blank] being by us approved and appointed collectors for the [blank] within the [blank] of the moneys payable to Their Majesties by vertue of an Act of this present Parliament, intituled, An act for a grant to Their Majesties of an aid of twelve pence in the pound for one year for the necessary defence of their realms.
notes: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in: Christ Church (University of Oxford). Library.
